name: Electro Clash - Stefan Bartolo
description:
An addictive game played with 1 simple mouse mechanic which will test your ability to aim and control your player in order to achieve your goal. It may look simple but you will find that appearances are deceiving.

This game was made for the Blackthorn Prod Game Jam 2021

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Rules

One Mechanic More Fun - All you need to do is click on Electro, drag and aim to kill the enemies. 

When you kill them all , you will proceed to the next level. 

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Controls and Game Play

This Game uses only s mouse!

  • Aim in the direction of the enemies to destroy them. Beware, spikes are deadly.
  • Navigate Electro through the world
  • Use SPACE BAR to Pause Game
  • To stay alive, you need to watch your energy meter that will rapidly deplete. However, don’t despair, you can refill it when killing enemies
  • The yellow gives you 1 energy bar, the green 2 and the blue power bar gives you 5

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Credits - Game was entirely designed by me including the art and music.

Thanks for playing my game!

Stefan Bartolo - RebBack Prod :)
